books.title: When Money Dies
books.author: Adam Fergusson
books.description: The nightmare of deficit spending, devaluation, and hyperinflation in Weimar Germany.

books.title: Dying of Money
books.author: Jens O. Parsson
books.description: Lessons of the great German and American inflations.

books.title: The Economics of Inflation
books.author: Costantino Bresciani-Turroni
books.description: A comprehensive study of the German currency depreciation after World War I.
